Name: Regulating circumcision by the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to regulating circumcision by the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Health

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. Chapter 1 of title 17 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding new section 17-198 to read as follows:
§ 17-198  Prohibition of the regulation of circumcision by the department or board.  The board and the department are both hereby proscribed from enacting or enforcing any regulation concerning circumcision within New York City.
	§2.	 This local law shall take effect effective immediately after its enactment into law.


LO/DSH
LS# 4627
Date 9/9/13
